Migration Summary

  What Was Done

  Phase 1: OKLCH Fallbacks

  - Added RGB fallback declarations before each OKLCH color in design-system.css

  1. useOnboarding.ts - Replaced 3 btn-base buttons with utility classes
  2. PricingSection.vue - Replaced 1 btn-base button
  3. SelectDropdown.vue - Replaced form-control-base and badge-base
  4. Button.vue (base component) - Removed btn-base, added utility base classes
  5. Card.vue (base component) - Removed card-base, added utility base classes
  6. Badge.vue (base component) - Removed badge-base, added utility base classes
  7. PrimaryButton.vue - Replaced btn-base btn-md with utility classes
  8. OutlineButton.vue - Replaced btn-base btn-md with utility classes
  9. WorkflowCard.vue - Replaced 2 btn-base buttons with utility classes
  10. index.ts - Updated componentSizes.button exports to use utility classes
  instead of removed classes

  Phase 3: CSS Cleanup

  - Deleted: src/styles/components.css (1,573 lines)
  - Removed: Semantic surface utilities from utilities.css (simple one-property
  rules)
  - Updated: global.css to remove components.css import
  - Kept: Complex utilities (glass effects, focus rings, gradients, a11y
  helpers)

  Audit Instructions for Next Session

  1. Search for Remaining Component Class References

  # Search entire codebase for old component classes
  grep -r "btn-base\|btn-sm\|btn-md\|btn-lg\|btn-xl\|btn-xs" src/
  grep -r "card-base\|card-interactive" src/
  grep -r "form-control-base" src/
  grep -r "badge-base" src/

  2. Check Scoped Styles in Vue Components

  - src/components/vue/base/Button.vue ✅ (already fixed)
  - src/components/vue/base/Card.vue ✅ (already fixed)

  - src/components/vue/buttons/PrimaryButton.vue ✅ (already fixed)
  - src/components/vue/buttons/OutlineButton.vue ✅ (already fixed)

  4. Test Visual Appearance

  - Run dev server: pnpm run dev
  - Check these specific components:
    - Navbar buttons (Dashboard, Logout) - reported broken, now fixed
    - All buttons across the app
    - Form inputs and dropdowns
    - Cards
    - Badges
    - Modals

  5. Validate Utility-First Pattern

  All buttons should now use this pattern:
  <button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2
  rounded-lg font-medium bg-primary-500 hover:bg-primary-600 focus-ring
  transition-fast">

  6. Check Build Success

  pnpm run build  # Should complete with exit code 0

  Expected Pattern Replacements

  | Old               | New (Utility-First)
                                                       |
  |-------------------|---------------------------------------------------------
  -----------------------------------------------------|
  | btn-base btn-md   | inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2
  rounded-lg font-medium                               |
  | card-base         | rounded-lg border shadow-md

  | form-control-base | w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-200
  dark:border-gray-700 rounded-lg bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 focus-ring |
  | badge-base        | inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 rounded-md font-medium

  All replaced components should maintain full dark mode support with dark:
